meanings.definition: A person who heals or cures
meanings.sent1: The healers in the village used natural remedies to cure illnesses.
meanings.sent2: The healers at the hospital work tirelessly to help patients recover.
meanings.sent3: The healers' magical touch could even make a grumpy cat feel better.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like healers for his wounded heart, soothing the pain.
meanings.sent5: The healers' presence brought a sense of comfort and hope to the community.

meanings.definition: Those who provide medical treatment or care
meanings.sent1: The healers in the clinic were always ready to assist anyone in need.
meanings.sent2: Modern healers use advanced technology to diagnose and treat diseases.
meanings.sent3: The healers' waiting room felt like a cozy gathering of friends.
meanings.sent4: Their dedication to helping others made them true healers of the soul.
meanings.sent5: The healers' expertise and compassion made all the difference in patient recovery.

meanings.definition: The act of healing or curing
meanings.sent1: The healers' touch seemed to have a magical effect on the wounded bird.
meanings.sent2: Healing is a gradual process, but the healers never gave up on their patients.
meanings.sent3: The healers' dance brought joy and laughter, curing the town of sadness.
meanings.sent4: Time was the ultimate healer, slowly mending the broken pieces.
meanings.sent5: The healers' presence filled the room with a sense of peace and tranquility.
